days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Glorious St Alphonsus, loving Father of the poor and sick, all your life you devoted yourself with a heroic charity, to lighten their spiritual and bodily miseries.
Full of confidence in your tender pity for the sick, since you yourself patiently bore the cross of illness, I come to you for help in my present needs (mention request here).
I place myself under your protection that you may always be my guide in the way of holiness and salvation.
Loving father of the suffering, St Alphonsus, look with compassion upon me in my suffering.
Ask God to give me good health of mind and body, and if not, give me great peace and joy in God’s will.
I unite my sufferings to Christ, in union with His great sufferings, and with those of Our Lady, Mother of Sorrows, for the salvation of souls on earth and in Purgatory, and in thanksgiving for the remission of my many sins. 
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

St Alphonsus, you said, that every saint became a saint through Mental Prayer.
Help me learn to do Mental Prayer each day and spend time quietly with Our Lord. Amen.
Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
